title: Final Year Project I
description: The course is designed to provide students with an opportunity to carry out, under the supervision of an academic staff, an independent project with research elements in computation data science topics. Advisory: For majors only.
outcome: 1) Be able to identify and have a basic understanding of the literature related to the project topic. 2) Be able to define and complete a project that utilizes results in the literature. 3) Be able to perform a critical review of the project. 4) Develop technical writing skills.
syllabus: The course is designed to provide students with an opportunity to carry out, under the supervision of an academic staff, an independent project with research elements in computation data science topics.
required_readings: Literature review materials will be recommended by the project supervisor.
